members.comment: Constructs a new instance of DefaultMenuLayout.

param: target - the container that needs to be laid out
axis - the axis to lay out components along. Can be one of: BoxLayout.X_AXIS, BoxLayout.Y_AXIS, BoxLayout.LINE_AXIS or BoxLayout.PAGE_AXIS

name: javax.swing.plaf.basic.DefaultMenuLayout
comment: The default layout manager for Popup menus and menubars. This class is an extension of BoxLayout which adds the UIResource tag so that pluggable L&Fs can distinguish it from user-installed layout managers on menus.
